descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Dive into **Apex Construct**, the original VR action-adventure classic. Discover intense archery combat and a gripping story in an award-winning single-player campaign.

# Experience The VR Classic

Awaken in a stunning post-apocalyptic world. Grab your bow and uncover the mystery behind two warring AI entities. Battle against powerful mechanical enemies, and explore the rustic remains of a civilization lost to time. Upgrade your gear, hunt for collectibles, and prepare to ask yourself: who can you trust?

[media]

# Features:

* Full 7+ hour single-player narrative campaign
* Deep action system with authentic bow combat
* Compete in leaderboards in the challenge-driven Cygnia Cup
* Specific graphics enhancements to make the most of Quest 3, 2, and 1

[media]
